lines.text: Now, listen, you can beg all you want, I'm not going out with the dame!
You remember what happened last time you introduced me to a dame from Pittsburg?
Why the comic valentine! I couldn't get rid of her! She turned out to be a pest!
Well, this one's different. She's a pip!
Well, I do hope Mr. Chase likes this lunch I prepared for him.
Oh, Mr. Chase, have you ever been to Pittsburg?
Why, no, Miss Todd. As a matter of fact, I've never been out of the United States.
